.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite-footer__facebook {
    width: 10px;
    height: 16px;
    background-position: -5px -5px;
}

.sprite-footer__twitter {
    width: 16px;
    height: 13px;
    background-position: -25px -5px;
}
